column1: Trump has been doing all he can to “push the spread” of Coronavirus from the WH… Coronavirus has killed over 100,000 Americans… the protests could be disastrous for the spread of Coronavirus… Trump won’t do anything to calm the crowd… he’ll exacerbate it… we can’t let him…

We’ve all been suffering from the most unbelievable combinations of “perfect storms”… like a constant conflagration of perfect storms… Chauvin wasn’t arrested… set off protests across the country… this will be bad for the spread of Coronavirus… we need to be able to focus…
